thread.section_title: Solid Apollo LED Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solid Apollo LED | solidapollo.com
thread.title: Doug
thread.title_full: Solid Apollo LED reviewed by Doug

author: Doug
title: Doug
text: Great product but I put 36 ft on rail of iron wrought iron porch and it is so bright it looks from afar like an Alien's landing area. Apolo support folks were extremely helpful , knowledgeable and courteous when they helped me order. I just wished they would have more fully described how bright they would be when I told them what use I had planned
